mapper.sql: im.id as id, im.name as name, im.title as title, CONCAT(im.`size`) as `size`, im.description as description, im.is_open as isOpen, im.process_status as processStatus, im.like_number as likeNumber, im.redirect_number as redirectNumber, im.browse_number as browseNumber, im.prototype_visit_address as prototypeVisitAddress, im.recognition_visit_address as recognitionVisitAddress, im.upload_user_id as uploadUserId
mapper.select: select user.id as id, user.head_image as headImage, user.ip as ip, user.last_login_time as lastLoginTime, user.name as name, user.phone_number as phoneNumber, user.sex as sex, user.wx_number as wxNumber, user.description as description from front_user user where id = #{id}
select , (im.like_number+im.redirect_number+im.browse_number) as integration from image im where im.is_open = 1 and im.process_status = 1 order by integration desc

select
from image im where im.is_open = 1 and im.process_status = 1 order by im.crt_time desc

select
from image im where im.upload_user_id = #{userId} order by im.crt_time desc
select process_status as status, recognition_visit_address as recognitionVisitAddress from image where id = #{id}
